text: Sale Sharks are a rugby club based in Manchester, England who play in the Aviva Premiership. The club, originally based at Heywood Road in Sale, share the Salford City Stadium with the Salford City Reds. The Sharks won the Aviva Premiership in 2006. ==League position== Season League Position 2010/11 Aviva Premiership 10th 2011/12 Aviva Premiership 6th 2012/13 Aviva Premiership 10th ===Former position=== Category:English rugby union teams Category:1861 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1860s establishments in England Category:Sport in Greater Manchester
title: Sale Sharks
